Sentencas: As solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) technology is moving closer to a commercial break through, lifetime limiting factors, and methods to measure the state-of-health of operating cells and stacks are becoming of increasing interest.
Titulo: Electrochemical Characterization and Degradation Analysis of Large SOFC Stacks by Impedance Spectroscopy

Sentencas: This requires application of advanced methods for detailed electrochemical characterization during operation.
Titulo: Electrochemical Characterization and Degradation Analysis of Large SOFC Stacks by Impedance Spectroscopy

Sentencas: An experimental stack with low ohmic resistance from Topsoe Fuel Cell A/S was characterized in detail using electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS).
Titulo: Electrochemical Characterization and Degradation Analysis of Large SOFC Stacks by Impedance Spectroscopy

Sentencas: An investigation of the optimal geometrical placement of the current feeds and voltage probes was carried out in order to minimize measurement errors caused by stray impedances.
Titulo: Electrochemical Characterization and Degradation Analysis of Large SOFC Stacks by Impedance Spectroscopy

Sentencas: Three different stack geometries were investigated by impedance spectroscopy and the stack geometry with the minimum effect of stray impedances was selected.
Titulo: Electrochemical Characterization and Degradation Analysis of Large SOFC Stacks by Impedance Spectroscopy

Sentencas: A 13-cell experimental SOFC stack was tested during 2,500h of operation with hydrogen as fuel with 52% fuel utilization and constant current load (0.2Acm(-2)) at 750 degrees
Titulo: Electrochemical Characterization and Degradation Analysis of Large SOFC Stacks by Impedance Spectroscopy

Sentencas: C. Stack interconnects were coated with six different coatings to prevent chromium poisoning on the cathode side.
Titulo: Electrochemical Characterization and Degradation Analysis of Large SOFC Stacks by Impedance Spectroscopy

Sentencas: Four repeating units (RUs) with different coatings were selected for detailed impedance analysis.
Titulo: Electrochemical Characterization and Degradation Analysis of Large SOFC Stacks by Impedance Spectroscopy

Sentencas: EIS allowed a distinction to be made in terms of the degradation between the four RU types that is not possible from IV-data only.
Titulo: Electrochemical Characterization and Degradation Analysis of Large SOFC Stacks by Impedance Spectroscopy
